_sText:
***********************************

CHURCHES X FINAL  ** FIXED **

***********************************



gg_churches_x_final
by Jeremy "Air" Hurley



   This map was released on 5/5. I made this map over the course of 5 days on and off.

   Of course, this map is very similar to my gg_churches_x map, but this is the updated and final version. You will find all the new features that have been updated below. I planned for more features but took them out due to many reasons. Gungame maps are about fun and not so much realism or details so I took out things like elaborate background scenery and buildings, etc.



NEW FEATURES
------------

** Bomb site's items now explode!
** Environmental sounds to add realism!
** Interior high platform inside each church now destructible!
** Destructible plants on outer walls!
** More trees and other plant-life!
** AND -- A whole new area of action on the sides with a gazebo!
** Much more!


FIXED BUG:

I fixed the skybox leak/tear effect on the sides. It's 99% fixed. Not 100% but 99%. So when you download now, you'll have gg_churches_x_final_fixed -- I renamed it with "_fixed" because too many people don't know to delete the old map file if a server won't let them connect saying they have the wrong version.

OTHER NOTES:

This map is very fun and is defininitely the last I'll make of churches. It's far superior to gg_churches_x in my opinion but let me know your thoughts. Thanks guys and have fun!

As awlays, come play with me on my server:


72.26.102.140:27015

WarmFuzzyLand - 100 Tick Gun Game


-Air
